amendment.description: Amendment provides $10 million in additional funds to increase training for investigators to properly investigate sexual assault related offenses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A066) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A066) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A066) offered by Ms. Speier.
